title: [RECRUITING] [DIA/PLAT] RKLe5 Gaming eSports Team
body:
Hey guys RKLe5 Gaming is recruiting again! We're looking for players in Plat/Dia ELO. If you're interested, please add Mr Zeroxs on LoL ASAP!
~ Zach or RKLe5 Zeroxs

Disclaimer: _**I WILL NOT**_  be playing in this team and only manage it, I am no where near as good as any of the players in the team. _(Bronze 1 SoloQ | 2/4 placements Flex)_

replies.body: Hey man, I'm really passionate for playing on a team, I'm gold 2 was plat 4 I know I'm below what you're asking for. But please consider this thanks.

Hey I understand I'm way lower than the Asking elo (G4).. but I do skrim a lot with high plat/diamond players so I'm familiar with the elo difference if that means anything :/.. just looking to improve as a player and am trying to find a 5 man team to take it more seriously.  Any advise is wanted

Hey dude! I'd also like to talk to you regarding this, add me on Discord and we'll work out an appropriate position for you :)
Pepe#5417
Hey man, I'm an adc bouncing between plat 2-4, would be keen to try playing on a team, chuck us a message if you're keen!

Hey! Definitely keen!! If you'd like to talk on Discord through DM's just add me :)
Pepe#5417
